title: HELP, Cant connect to games Issue!
body:
Just lost my Diamond promos (2-3) for not being able to connect to my games... twice, tried to see if I could connect to a normal game with no luck and that got me into low priority queue...HOW DO I STOP THIS, lamest promos ever :/

I'll explain what happened, anyone has an idea of what to do?:
champ select timer went to 0 and i got sent to the client screen with the reconnect button, clicked on reconnect to get the game still on progress message and the reconnect button popping up again immediately, closed client, reopened, same thing. This has happened 3 times now, 2 on my diamond promos and 1 in a normal queue and now im in low priority due to AFKs....pls help

replies.body:
It sounds like your network was having some problems maintaining a solid connection throughout champion select, and since it couldn't verify your champion pick due to the lag it assumed that you weren't actually there. Even if you can't reconnect or get booted out because of a break in your connection, it does still count as a loss due to the fact your other teammates were essentially gimped in that match.

A good first step in troubleshooting this would be to take a step back and make sure you can make it through those games before jumping back in a ranked queue. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to open some ports and flush your DNS, but make sure to go through all of the steps in that guide to be safe.
I am also having this issue. Says can't connect to network and gives me the option to retry or cancel. Worked fine earlier and now this..
